article:
The computer is important and can help us do a lot of things. Lots of children spend too much time on the computer. It's bad for their study. Here is some advice  for the parents.
*Move the computer out of the child's bedroom. It is good for children to reduce   the time to use the computer.

*If your child uses the Internet for studying. He / She doesn't use it to play games, praise   him/her for that.
*When your child wants to use the computer to play games, you can take her/him to the library, get her/him together with friends to play sport.
